text: Other Tales of the Flying Fox, known as Fei Hu Wai Zhuan (or Feihu Waizhuan) in Chinese, is a novel by Jin Yong. An alternate English title is Young Flying Fox. It may also refer to: Adaptations of the novel * Legend of the Fox, a 1980 Hong Kong film * New Tales of the Flying Fox, a 1984 Hong Kong film * The Sword of Many Loves, a 1993 Hong Kong film
title: Other Tales of the Flying Fox (disambiguation)
